html:
2026-0157
2026-02-24TCFinancial Administration ActAppointment of the President and Chief Executive Officer of VIA Rail Canada Inc., on an interim basisAppointment of Mathieu Paquette of Laval, Quebec, to be President and Chief Executive Officer of VIA Rail Canada Inc., on an interim basis, to hold office during pleasure for a term of eighteen months or until such time as a new President and Chief Executive Officer is appointed, whichever occurs first.N/A
subject: Appointment of the President and Chief Executive Officer of VIA Rail Canada Inc., on an interim basis
precis: Appointment of Mathieu Paquette of Laval, Quebec, to be President and Chief Executive Officer of VIA Rail Canada Inc., on an interim basis, to hold office during pleasure for a term of eighteen months or until such time as a new President and Chief Executive Officer is appointed, whichever occurs first.
